title: 打开“材质包”界面 即便不换材质 只要点完成 就崩溃 或者点一下别的材质也崩溃
author: shanggelilacraf
txt_content:
打开“材质包”界面 即便不换材质 只要点完成 就崩溃 或者点一下别的材质也崩溃

应该不是mod的问题，不换材质的话直接进去游戏一点问题没有

以下是崩溃后显示的信息：

Mods loaded: 12
ModLoader 1.2.5
mod_ModLoaderMp 1.2.5v1
mod_MinecraftForge 3.1.2.90
mod_CraftGuide 1.4.3 for Minecraft 1.2.3
mod_mocreatures v3.6.2 (MC 1.2.5)
mod_RedPowerControl 2.0pr5b2
mod_RedPowerCore 2.0pr5b2
mod_RedPowerLighting 2.0pr5b2
mod_RedPowerLogic 2.0pr5b2
mod_RedPowerMachine 2.0pr5b2
mod_RedPowerWiring 2.0pr5b2
mod_RedPowerWorld 2.0pr5b2

      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem.




--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT fb158f25 --------
Generated 12-7-16 下午7:10

Minecraft: Minecraft 1.2.5
OS: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
Java: 1.7.0_05, Oracle Corporation
VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
LWJGL: 2.4.2
OpenGL: GeForce 9400 GT/PCIe/SSE2/3DNOW! version 3.3.0, NVIDIA Corporation

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: input == null!
    at javax.imageio.ImageIO.read(Unknown Source)
    at aaw.a(RenderEngine.java:691)
    at aaw.b(RenderEngine.java:634)
    at em.a(SourceFile:63)
    at vp.a(SourceFile:74)
    at em.a(SourceFile:71)
    at vp.f(SourceFile:122)
    at vp.i(SourceFile:110)
    at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.k(Minecraft.java:1561)
    at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.x(Minecraft.java:819)
    at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(Minecraft.java:747)
    at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
--- END ERROR REPORT 58c23294 ----------

求教这是怎么回事 怎么解决

replies.author: sylqiuyifeng
replies.txt_content: 一般来说装了mod好像有机会出现这问题……

replies.author: zhj6690260
replies.txt_content: 提示你的输入端有问题，一定是有一些Mod修改了Minecraft的输入端导致的问题，关闭或者卸载掉那个Mod就行了！

replies.author: sabo970
replies.txt_content: 重启游戏吧==嫌麻烦的话
